00008 SPS_Hook::SPS_Hook()
00009 {
00010     m_Hook.h_Entry    = (HOOKFUNC)sHookEntry;
00011     m_Hook.h_SubEntry = NULL;
00012     m_Hook.h_Data     = this;
00013 }

00016 int32 SPS_Hook::sHookEntry(struct Hook* hook,APTR object, APTR message)
00017 {
00018     _D( "SPS_Hook::HookEntry( e0x%08x )\n", hook->h_Data );
00019     int32 result = -1;
00020     try {
00021         SPS_Hook *pHook = dynamic_cast<SPS_Hook*>((SPS_Hook*)hook->h_Data);
00022         if (pHook)
00023         {
00024             result = pHook->OnEntry(object,message);
00025         }
00026     } catch ( ... ) {
00027         _D( "SPS_Hook::HookEntry( ) - cought an exception!\n" );
00028     }
00029     _D( "SPS_Hook::HookEntry( ) = %d\n", result );
00030     return result;;
00031 }
